meta.title: Diagnostic Criteria for the Most Common Temporomandibular Disorders
meta.subtitle: Symptom Questionnaire and Clinical Examination Items

source.authors: Schiffman E, Ohrbach R, Truelove E, Look J, Anderson G, Goulet J-P, List T, Svensson P, Gonzalez Y, Lobbezoo F, Michelotti A, Brooks S, Ceusters W, Drangsholt M, Ettlin D, Gaul C, Goldberg LJ, Haythornthwaite J, Hollender L, Jensen R, John MT, deLaat A, deLeeuw R, Maixner W, van der Meulen M, Murray GM, Nixdorf DR, Palla S, Petersson A, Pionchon P, Smith B, Visscher C, Zakrzewska J, and Dworkin SF
source.title: Diagnostic Criteria for Temporomandibular Disorders (DC/TMD) for Clinical and Research Applications: Recommendations of the International RDC/TMD Consortium Network and Orofacial Pain Special Interest Group
source.journal: Journal of Oral & Facial Pain and Headache

notes: All listed criteria in History (DC/TMD Symptom Questionnaire) and Examination (DC/TMD Examination Form) are required for the specific Diagnosis unless otherwise stated
Each criterion is positive unless otherwise specified

Exact time period for time-relevant History or Examination items is not specified since that is a function of how the items are constructed to suit a given purpose; the logic does not change according to time period
The time period as assessed by history items for disc displacement without reduction vs with reduction is relative

questionnaire_items.SQ4: Pain modified by jaw movement, function, or parafunction
questionnaire_items.SQ5: Headache of any type in temporal region
questionnaire_items.SQ7: Headache affected by jaw movement, function, or parafunction
questionnaire_items.SQ9: TMJ lock with limited opening (current or prior)
questionnaire_items.SQ10: Limitation severe enough to interfere with ability to eat
questionnaire_items.SQ13: TMJ locking or catching in wide open jaw position
questionnaire_items.SQ14: Unable to close mouth without specific maneuver

examination_items.E1a: Location of pain in last 30 days
examination_items.E1b: Location of headache in last 30 days
examination_items.E4b: Maximum unassisted opening with pain assessment
examination_items.E4c: Maximum assisted opening with pain assessment
examination_items.E5a: Right lateral excursion with pain assessment
examination_items.E5b: Left lateral excursion with pain assessment
examination_items.E6: TMJ noises during open and close movements
examination_items.E7: TMJ noises during lateral and protrusive movements
examination_items.E9: Muscle and TMJ pain with palpation

history.description: Pain modified by jaw movement, function, or parafunction

examination.description: Confirmation of pain in masticatory muscle(s)
Familiar pain in masticatory muscle(s) with either muscle palpation or maximum opening
examination.form_logic: (E4b OR E4c OR E9: familiar pain in temporalis or masseter) OR (E10: familiar pain in supplemental muscles, if E10 included)

examination.description: Confirmation of pain in masticatory muscle(s)
Familiar pain with muscle palpation
examination.form_logic: (E9: familiar pain in masseter or temporalis) OR (E10: familiar pain in supplemental muscles, if E10 included)

examination.description: Pain remains local to the area of stimulation
examination.form_logic: (E9: negative referred pain AND negative spreading pain) AND (E10: negative referred pain AND negative spreading pain, if E10 included)

examination.description: Confirmation of pain in masticatory muscle(s)
Familiar pain with muscle palpation
examination.form_logic: (E9: familiar pain in masseter or temporalis) OR (E10: familiar pain in supplemental muscles, if E10 included)

examination.description: Spreading (but not referred) pain with muscle palpation
examination.form_logic: ((E9: spreading pain) OR (E10: spreading pain, if E10 included)) AND ((E9: negative referred pain) AND (E10: negative referred pain, if E10 included))

examination.description: Confirmation of pain in masticatory muscle(s)
Familiar pain with muscle palpation
examination.form_logic: (E9: familiar pain in masseter or temporalis) OR (E10: familiar pain in supplemental muscles, if E10 included)

examination.description: Referred pain with muscle palpation
examination.form_logic: (E9: positive referred pain) OR (E10: positive referred pain, if E10 included)

history.description: Pain modified by jaw movement, function, or parafunction

examination.description: Confirmation of pain in TMJ(s)
Familiar pain with TMJ palpation or range of motion
examination.form_logic: E4b, E4c, E5a-c, or E9: familiar pain in TMJ

pain_disorders.name: Headache Attributed to TMD
notes: For a secondary headache diagnosis, a primary diagnosis of either myalgia or arthralgia is required

history.description: Headache of any type in temporal region
Headache affected by jaw movement, function, or parafunction

examination.description: Confirmation of headache in temporalis muscle
Report of familiar headache in temporalis area from either palpation of the temporalis muscle or range of motion of jaw
examination.form_logic: E4b, E4c, E5a-c, or E9: familiar headache pain in the temporalis muscle

history.description: Current TMJ noises by history OR patient reports noise during the examination
history.logic: SQ8 OR (E6 or E7: noise reported by patient)

examination.description: Click(s) with opening and closing
Both click with opening or closing AND click with lateral or protrusive movements
examination.form_logic: (E6: open or close click) AND (E7: protrusive or lateral click)

criteria.examination_logic: (E6: open & close click) OR ((E6: open or close click) AND (E7: protrusive or lateral click))

joint_disorders.name: Disc Displacement with Reduction, with Intermittent Locking

history.description: Same as disc displacement with reduction
Current intermittent locking with limited opening

examination.description: Same as disc displacement with reduction
When disorder present in clinic: maneuver required to open mouth

joint_disorders.name: Disc Displacement without Reduction, with Limited Opening

history.description: Current TMJ lock with limited opening
Limitation severe enough to interfere with ability to eat

examination.description: Passive stretch (maximum assisted opening) < 40mm

joint_disorders.name: Disc Displacement without Reduction, without Limited Opening

history.description: Prior TMJ lock with limited opening
history.note: Prior = based on SQ9 interpretation (change over time)

history.description: Limitation severe enough to interfere with ability to eat

examination.description: Passive stretch (maximum assisted opening) >= 40mm

notes: 'Current' and 'Prior' (as based on SQ9) for distinguishing the 'with limitation' vs 'without limitation' variants are interpreted based on change over time as determined by history and as confirmed by the clinical examination for jaw range of motion

history.description: Current TMJ noises by history OR patient reports noise during the examination
history.logic: SQ8 OR (E6 or E7: noise reported by patient)

examination.description: Crepitus during jaw movement
examination.form_logic: E6 or E7: crepitus detected by examiner

history.description: TMJ locking or catching in wide open jaw position
Unable to close mouth without specific maneuver

examination.description: When disorder present in clinic: maneuver required to close mouth

myalgia_subtypes.description: Myalgia subtypes are mutually exclusive based on pain pattern

differentiation.local_myalgia: Pain remains local, no spreading, no referral
differentiation.myofascial_pain_with_spreading: Pain spreads within muscle boundary, no referral

disc_displacement_variants.description: Disc displacement variants based on reduction and opening limitation

changes: "Myofascial Pain" revised to "Myofascial Pain with Spreading", to reconcile the table with the decision tree previously updated
For Disk Displacement with Reduction, Examination E7 was clarified by adding "(protrusive or lateral)" for the type of click expected to fulfill criterion

Incorrect sensitivity and specificity values were present for some disorders; this error was identified by an observant translation team leader, and the error is assumed to have emerged during preparation of the table prior to computation of final sensitivity and specificity estimates for the published DC/TMD
Added "OR" to "Current TMJ noises by history" for each of Disc Displacement with Reduction and Degenerative Joint Disease, as per published DC/TMD
Added diagnostic criterion note to Headache Secondary to TMD, with regard to necessity of either a myalgia or arthralgia diagnosis in order to have a secondary headache
Corrected name of disorder "myofascial pain"; was incorrectly stated as "myofascial pain with spreading"
